review: Earlier, I sent a message that I did not want the stick because the remote was very difficult to open, and I was sending it back.  My money was immediately refunded (thank you) and a return label was emailed to me.  However, I managed to pry open the remote control with a knife and now I won't be sending it back.  I'm using the system and love it.  Please take back your money from my account.  The remote could still use some tweaking.
author: Evelyn Marie Lizana

review: Honestly? I ordered it on a whim, not really expecting it to work. Didn't realize that it has to be plugged in to the wall outlet to work, but that was just me not reading the specs page. But I love that dang thing. It pulls wifi from the other end of my house, a feat my cell phone can't manage most days, and the included remote is quite nice and also throws a powerful signal to the stick. So powerful, that I discovered my preschooler had stuck it between the mattresses when I rolled over in bed :)Of course, it would of been better had I not just paid for Prime specifically for the ability to stream my favorite show, Doctor Who, into my bedroom, only to discover that Amazon has dropped almost all BBC shows in the name of some ridiculous quest to alienate customers and carry "exclusive" content that not many people want to watch. But that's okay, the quest for my shows led me to discover a significantly cheaper new alternative to cable
author: Amazon Customer "Mom of 2"
